title: How to Escape the Crimson Room

steps.title: In this game, you move around, collect and use items by clicking.
steps.content: In this game, you move around, collect and use items by clicking. The items you currently have are in your inventory, which is located on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: You will then awaken in the Crimson Room.
steps.content: You will then awaken in the Crimson Room. While facing the ceiling, click toward the bottom of the game window to look down. You should now be facing a blue door and a yellow chest of drawers holding various items.

steps.title: Click to zoom in on the table, and then again to zoom in on the yellow bowl that sits on top.
steps.content: Click to zoom in on the table, and then again to zoom in on the yellow bowl that sits on top. Take the thin ring inside of it.

steps.title: Open the two drawers that don't have keyholes.
steps.content: Open the two drawers that don't have keyholes. In the drawer on the upper-left, you will find a CD , and in the other a memo .

steps.title: You will find a cassette tape.
steps.content: You will find a cassette tape .

steps.title: If you click on the curtain, it will open.
steps.content: If you click on the curtain , it will open. On the windowsill you will find a small silver key.

steps.title: After about five times, a thick ring will fall, which you will collect.
steps.content: After about five times, a thick ring will fall, which you will collect .

steps.title: Turn right to face the bed.
steps.content: Turn right to face the bed.

steps.title: When you lift it, you will find a small silver key underneath.
steps.content: When you lift it, you will find a small silver key underneath.

steps.title: Click on the part of the mattress closest to the headboard of the bed.
steps.content: Click on the part of the mattress closest to the headboard of the bed. Click in the very middle of the headboard, and you'll discover an odd metal stick.

steps.title: You'll need to click at the bottom-left corner.
steps.content: You'll need to click at the bottom-left corner. If you click in the right spot, you will find a blue battery at the foot of the bed .

steps.title: Turn right once more to face the original wall with the door.
steps.content: Turn right once more to face the original wall with the door .

steps.title: The gold fits into the right drawer, and the silver into the left.
steps.content: The gold fits into the right drawer, and the silver into the left. In the right drawer, you will find a power cord. In the left, you'll discover an odd red box.

steps.title: Zoom in on the stereo and connect the power cord.
steps.content: Zoom in on the stereo and connect the power cord. Press the power button to turn the stereo on and collect the key from the CD slot.

steps.title: Notice the strange slots on its top.
steps.content: Notice the strange slots on its top. In these slots, you can insert the metal stick and the two rings. The box will now open .

steps.title: Insert the cassette and battery into their spots inside of the box.
steps.content: Insert the cassette and battery into their spots inside of the box. Click on the box.

steps.title: You will notice that toward the end of the video, a "+" appears on the screen.
steps.content: You will notice that toward the end of the video, a "+" appears on the screen. The dancing man stops dancing to point to this spot. While he does this, move your mouse onto the spot. Wait until the end of the video, and then click on the spot where the "+" sign was. A rectangular slot should appear on the wall, and it opens to reveal a safe.

steps.title: Examine the memo in your inventory.
steps.content: Examine the memo in your inventory.

steps.title: Copy and paste the url on the memo or if the link is broken, you can search help in google for the code.
steps.content: Copy and paste the url on the memo or if the link is broken, you can search help in google for the code.

steps.title: It will take you to another game window with a table in the middle of a room.
steps.content: It will take you to another game window with a table in the middle of a room. The table has four cards on it. Turn them over and they will reveal the code for the safe. (Note: The numbers on the cards are different every time you play. Additionally, 1994 will always work as the code.)

steps.title: It will reveal the screwdriver.
steps.content: It will reveal the screwdriver .

steps.title: Use the screwdriver on the doorknob to open the door.
steps.content: Use the screwdriver on the doorknob to open the door.

steps.title: Give yourself a pat on the back
steps.content: Give yourself a pat on the back . You've escaped The Crimson Room!
